name: Bagel and cream cheese
description: How we dream about our future
detail: This meal is a staple of breakfast menus across America. The eggs are usually cooked to order, whether you prefer them scrambled, over-easy, sunny-side-up, or poached. The bacon or sausage is crispy and savory, and the hash browns or home fries are golden brown and crispy on the outside, tender on the inside. The toast or biscuit is typically served with butter and jam or honey. This breakfast is satisfying and hearty, perfect for starting your day off right.

name: Breakfast sandwich
description: How we dream about our future
detail: This classic breakfast dish is elegant and refined. The poached eggs are served on top of a toasted English muffin, which is topped with Canadian bacon or smoked salmon and hollandaise sauce. The dish is often garnished with fresh herbs, such as chives or parsley, which add a bright and fresh flavor to the dish. The eggs benedict is usually served with a side of hash browns or home fries, which add a crispy and savory contrast to the dish. This breakfast is luxurious and indulgent, perfect for a special occasion or a leisurely weekend morning.

name: Eggs Benedict
description: How we dream about our future
detail: These waffles are light and fluffy, with a crispy exterior and a tender interior. They are often served with whipped cream and fresh berries, which add a tart and sweet contrast to the waffles' buttery flavor. The waffles are also often drizzled with maple syrup or honey, which complements their rich flavor. This breakfast is a decadent treat, perfect for a special occasion or a lazy Sunday morning.

name: Eggs Benedict
description: How we dream about our future
detail: This traditional Mexican breakfast dish is spicy and savory. The fried or poached egg is served on top of a crispy corn tortilla, which is topped with a flavorful tomato sauce, refried beans, and melted cheese. The dish is often garnished with sliced avocado, sour cream, and salsa, which add creaminess, tanginess, and heat to the dish. This breakfast is hearty and satisfying, perfect for a day when you need a little extra energy.

name: Toast Croissant Fried Egg
description: How we dream about our future
detail: This trendy breakfast dish has become a modern classic. The toast is usually made with a thick slice of hearty bread, such as sourdough or whole wheat. The mashed avocado is seasoned with salt and pepper, and sometimes lemon juice or chili flakes. The toast is often topped with additional ingredients, such as feta cheese, smoked salmon, or a poached egg, which add texture and flavor to the dish. This breakfast is healthy and delicious, perfect for a quick and easy meal on the go.

name: Full Breakfast Fried Egg Toast Brunch
description: How we dream about our future
detail: This breakfast dish is popular in many parts of the world, but especially in the Southwest United States. The burrito is usually made with a flour tortilla, which is filled with scrambled eggs, chorizo or bacon, potatoes, and cheese. The burrito is often served with salsa and sour cream on the side, which add flavor and heat to the dish. This breakfast is filling and satisfying, perfect for a day when you need a little extra fuel.

name: Healthy Meal Plan
description: How we dream about our future
detail: This lunch option is perfect for those who want a satisfying and filling meal without feeling weighed down. The chicken breast is marinated in herbs and spices, then grilled to perfection. It's served on a soft roll or bun, which is toasted and brushed with garlic butter for added flavor. Lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise are the classic toppings, but some variations may include additional toppings such as cheese, bacon, avocado, or barbecue sauce. This lunch option is easy to eat on the go, making it a popular choice for those with busy schedules.

name: Fried Chicken Bento
description: How we dream about our future
detail: This classic salad is a popular choice for those who want a light and healthy lunch option. The salad typically features crisp romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, which is made with ingredients like garlic, anchovy paste, Dijon mustard, and lemon juice. Croutons and Parmesan cheese are added for texture and flavor. Grilled chicken, shrimp, or salmon can be added for a protein boost, making this salad a complete and satisfying meal.

name: Tarragon Rubbed Salmon
description: How we dream about our future
detail: This fresh and flavorful lunch option is perfect for those who want a taste of something different. The soft corn tortillas are filled with grilled or fried fish, which is usually seasoned with spices like cumin, chili powder, and paprika. Cabbage slaw adds crunch and freshness, while pico de gallo and a spicy aioli sauce add heat and flavor. A squeeze of fresh lime juice completes the dish, adding a tangy and bright flavor. This lunch option is perfect for those who want a taste of the beach, even if they're miles away from the ocean.

name: Indian Launch
description: How we dream about our future
detail: This lunch option is perfect for those who want a meatless alternative to the classic hamburger. The veggie burger is made with a patty made from vegetables, grains, and legumes, which is usually seasoned with herbs and spices to add flavor. It's served on a bun with lettuce, tomato, and condiments such as ketchup, mustard, or mayonnaise. Some variations may include additional toppings such as avocado, cheese, or caramelized onions. This lunch option is perfect for vegetarians or vegans, but it's also a great choice for those who want to try something different.

name: Beef Steak
description: How we dream about our future
detail: This lunch option is perfect for those who want a taste of Japanese cuisine. The bento box typically includes a variety of small portions of different foods such as rice, grilled or fried meat or fish, vegetables, and pickles. Some variations may include sushi rolls or tempura. This meal is often presented in a compartmentalized box for easy portability. The bento box is a great lunch option for those who want a variety of flavors and textures in one meal.

name: Honey Soy Glazed Salmon With Peppers
description: How we dream about our future
detail: This Italian-inspired lunch option is perfect for those who want a hearty and filling meal. The dish features a variety of fresh, seasonal vegetables, such as zucchini, bell peppers, and cherry tomatoes, saut√©ed in olive oil and garlic. The vegetables are then served over a bed of pasta, which is usually tossed with Parmesan cheese and herbs like basil and parsley. This lunch option is perfect for those who want to indulge in a satisfying and flavorful meal without feeling guilty.

name: Salmon with Grapefruit and Lentil Salad
description: How we dream about our future
detail: This Russian-inspired dinner option features tender strips of beef, which are cooked in a creamy and flavorful sauce made with sour cream, onions, and mushrooms. The sauce is often seasoned with herbs such as thyme, parsley, and bay leaves, which gives it a rich and comforting flavor. It's served with a side of egg noodles or mashed potatoes, which are perfect for soaking up the sauce. This dinner option is perfect for those who want a hearty and comforting meal, especially on a cold winter night.

name: Lemony Salmon Piccata
description: How we dream about our future
detail: This classic dinner option is perfect for meat lovers. The steak is usually a prime cut of beef, such as ribeye, sirloin, or filet mignon, which is seasoned with a blend of herbs and spices and grilled to perfection. The steak can be cooked to your desired level of doneness, from rare to well-done. It's often served with a side of roasted vegetables or a baked potato, and can be topped with garlic butter, saut√©ed mushrooms, or a red wine reduction sauce for added flavor. This dinner option is hearty and satisfying, making it a popular choice for those who want a filling meal.

name: Pork Tenderloin with Quinoa Pilaf
description: How we dream about our future
detail: This dinner option is perfect for those who love seafood. The platter typically includes a variety of fresh seafood such as shrimp, scallops, lobster, and fish, prepared in different ways such as grilled, fried, or saut√©ed. The seafood is often seasoned with herbs and spices to enhance its natural flavor. It's served with a side of vegetables or rice, and can be accompanied by sauces such as cocktail sauce, tartar sauce, or garlic butter. This dinner option is perfect for those who want to indulge in a variety of seafood flavors in one meal.

name: French fries with cheese
description: How we dream about our future
detail: This Italian-inspired dinner option features a breaded and pan-fried chicken breast, which is topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese. It's served with a side of pasta, which is usually tossed with garlic and olive oil. The chicken is often seasoned with herbs such as basil, oregano, and thyme to add flavor. This dinner option is perfect for those who want a satisfying and flavorful Italian meal.

name: Garlic Butter Baked Salmon
description: How we dream about our future
detail: This dinner option is perfect for vegetarians and those who want to try something different. The curry usually includes a variety of vegetables such as cauliflower, potatoes, carrots, and chickpeas, simmered in a fragrant and flavorful curry sauce. The sauce is often made with a blend of spices such as cumin, coriander, turmeric, and ginger, which gives it a unique and complex flavor. It's served with a side of rice or naan bread, which is perfect for soaking up the sauce. This dinner option is perfect for those who want to explore different cultures and flavors.

name: Baked Chicken
description: How we dream about our future
detail: This healthy dinner option is perfect for those who want a lighter meal. The salmon fillet is usually seasoned with herbs such as dill, lemon, and garlic, which enhances its natural flavor. It's grilled to perfection, so that the skin is crispy and the flesh is moist and tender. It's served with a side of roasted vegetables or quinoa salad, which adds texture and flavor to the meal. This dinner option is perfect for those who want a nutritious and delicious meal.
